entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 10:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
